body: Yeah or an empty `IntList`. `nullptr` is used as the default for `Generator*`.
body_html: Yeah or an empty IntList. nullptr is used as the default for Generator*.
body_text: Yeah or an empty IntList. nullptr is used as the default for Generator*.
